abstract: Users of Google Calendar who made a note of the “Star Trek” movie’s debut got a surprise on Friday.
snippet: Users of Google Calendar who made a note of the “Star Trek” movie’s debut got a surprise on Friday.
lead_paragraph: I got a momentary jolt when I flipped to the Google Calendar tab in my browser a few minutes ago. Every day in May had a new green box on it, with an indication like “Stardate: [-28] 01210.00.”

headline.main: Google Floods My Calendar With ‘Star Trek’ Geekery
